page.title: 12THE CHURCH CHOIR
page.content: {CHOIR} On Fridays we meet at Burbage Parish Church at 7.00 p.m. when we practice our songs for the Church services on the following Sunday. On Sunday morning the first service is Holy Communion then later we attend Matins where the choir sings Psalms out of a Psalter as well the Hymns out the Hymn book. In the evening three is another service where we sing. On Saturday's there is sometimes a Wedding when also go and sing. We also meet on a Monday at 6.30p.m. but this time we just play games we then have a drink and biscuit.It is called Choir club.
